snippet.title: Spacelords - Iune Character Reveal
snippet.description:
RAIDERS OF THE BROKEN PLANET is now SPACELORDS!
https://spacelordsthegame.com/news/raiders-of-the-broken-planet-reborns-as-spacelords

---

Iune is a native of the Broken Planet, born with a gift that sets her apart from her people; she is an Anhauarii, a weaver of Aleph capable of miraculous feats. As was traditional under ancient law, Iune left her village to live as a hermit to perfect her skills, but then the Human invasion to the Broken Planet struck. 

Armed with her hunting H1 carbine, dubbed “Last Wish”, Iune is a valuable addition to any Raiders team. Her formidable powers allow her to subvert her enemies’ will, forcing them to turn against their own comrades, whilst healing herself and her teammates. 

Iune is available now to be recruited by all Raiders of the Broken Planet players, independent of which campaigns they own. 

---

Learn more about Spacelords: https://spacelordsthegame.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mercurysteam
